name: Quantum Lock
summary: In this multiplayer freeze tag game, one player is selected as the Anti Virus whose job is to isolate all the Rogue Programs running rampant in the system. The Rogue Programs must avoid detection at all costs and gather as much data as they can. Each class has been given four unique class specific abilities to help them succeed in their mission. Play for hours or for only a few minutes in this fast paced, energetic cat and mouse style game.
